poster.username: I am ashamed to be here

body:

DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS If you are reading this comment your dick will be shortened by 4 inches within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry, please forgive me. I Know this may be seem nonsense but not gonna risk.
